tag_list: blogger, designer, coder, html, css, developer, develop, angel, grablev
overview:
Angel is a web developer that started his first web start-up at age 17.

Angel has worked for famous musicians including Jack Johnson and The Wailers. His expertise include design, coding, and programming. He is well versed in coding professional html and css pages, and designing high end templates using photoshop.

Angel’s first start-up was exfrag, a social network for gamers. Funding reached was $5000 from anonymous investors. The website was fully developed and functional within 6 months, it raised a good traffic flow and it gained some valuable members. Unfortunately the online gaming platform Steam came out with their own social network that had less features, but they had already possessed the database of millions of gamers.

His first real job in the web development industry was for a company named Oniracom who develop high end websites for musicians. Oniracom took Angel under their wing and taught him skills and techniques that help him deal with various web development issues every day and create cutting edge websites.

Currently Angel is the CEO of Freedcamp, the revolutionary Project Management and Collaboration platform. He is in charge of managing a team of 5 people while still being responsible for all Front-End interface design and implementation of the Application.
